casebody.data:
Evans et al., Appellees, v. Wallen et al; Cincinnati Insurance Company, Appellant.

[Cite as Evans v. Wallen, 105 Ohio St.3d 89, 2005-Ohio-571.]

(No. 2004-0664 Submitted February 2, 2005 Decided March 2, 2005.) Hammond, Stier & Stadnicar, Charles H. Stier and Joseph W. Stadnicar, for appellees. Freund, Freeze & Arnold and Christopher F. Johnson, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Hollon v. Clary, 104 Ohio St.3d 526, 2004-Ohio-6772, 820 N.E.2d 881, and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals for further proceedings not inconsistent therewith.

Moyer, C.J., Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur. Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
